name: Little Rincon : an eco friendly Handplane
description:
Dimensions: 14”x 7”x 3/8”

The second model in our line of eco friendly handplanes.  Does well in medium to large waves. Diamond tail and rocker in the nose and tail.  Comes with an adjustable velcro handstrap with a comfortable cover made from upcycled wetsuits. Each board comes with its own protective
bag.

Made from sustainable Paulownia wood with your choice of either a Spanish Cedar stinger or an upcycled skateboard stringer. 

Finished with an eco friendly,waterproof sealer made from whey, a natural and renewable resource.

Handplanes are used on your leading hand when bodysurfing. They give you an extra lift and help to get your upper body and head out of the water when riding a wave, giving you more control.
Our handplanes are among the most eco friendly on the market. Unlike recycled foam handplanes, our handplanes are made of wood from sustainably managed forests, not only ensuring that eco-systems are protected, but also allowing the product to be recycled or turned into organic matter long after its usefulness has passed.

All of our products are custom made so please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery.  We occasionally have boards in stock which can be shipped the next business day. Please contact us if you need your order quicker.

name: The Solimar : an eco friendly Handplane
description:
Dimensions: 17”x 7 3/8”x 3/8”

Named after the beach break it was shaped for, our first eco friendly handplane is designed to be the perfect all around board.  With a swallow tail and rocker in the nose and tail, it performs well in all conditions.

Choose either a hand-hold cut out or an adjustable velcro handstrap with a comfortable cover made from upcycled wetsuits. Each board comes with its own protective bag.

Made from sustainable Paulownia wood with your choice of either a Spanish Cedar stinger or an upcycled skateboard stringer. 

Finished with an eco friendly,waterproof sealer made from whey, a natural and renewable resource.

Handplanes are used on your leading hand when bodysurfing. They give you an extra lift and help to get your upper body and head out of the water when riding a wave, giving you more control.

Our handplanes are among the most eco friendly on the market. Unlike recycled foam handplanes, our handplanes are made of wood from sustainably managed forests, not only ensuring that eco-systems are protected, but also allowing the product to be recycled or turned into organic matter long after its usefulness has passed.

All of our products are custom made so please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery.  We occasionally have boards in stock which can be shipped the next business day. Please contact us if you need your order quicker.

Blue w/ hand hold cut out

name: The Dredge : an eco friendly Handplane
description:
Dimensions: 10 1/2”x 7 1/4”x 1/2”

The latest model in our line of eco friendly handplanes.  Shaped with a moon tail and deep channels through the middle for better steering on big hollow waves.  Comes with an adjustable velcro handstrap with a comfortable cover made from upcycled wetsuits.
Each board comes with its own protective bag.

Made from sustainable Paulownia wood with your choice of either a Spanish Cedar stinger or an upcycled skateboard stringer. 

Finished with an eco friendly,waterproof sealer made from whey, a natural and renewable resource.

Handplanes are used on your leading hand when bodysurfing. They give you an extra lift and help to get your upper body and head out of the water when riding a wave, giving you more control.
Our handplanes are among the most eco friendly on the market. Unlike recycled foam handplanes, our handplanes are made of wood from sustainably managed forests, not only ensuring that eco-systems are protected, but also allowing the product to be recycled or turned into organic matter long after its usefulness has passed.

All of our products are custom made so please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery.  We occasionally have boards in stock which can be shipped the next business day. Please contact us if you need your order quicker.

name: Handplane Kit - Blank
description:
Build your own handplane!

The Westside Boards handplane kit comes with a wood blank (8 ½” wide x 15" long), 2 leash plugs, a velcro hand strap and an upcycled neoprene strap cover. The wood is
sustainable Paulownia with a Spanish Cedar stringer.

This kit is perfect for the DIY Bodysurf enthusiast.  Templates available by request.  Shoot us the pics of your finished handplane creation and we'll post it on our social media pages.

We typically have wood in stock.  Please allow up to 7 days for delivery.

name: The Lunch Truck
description:
Dimensions: 36” x 18” x ½ “

A speedy bodyboard with great maneuverability.

Our take on the classic Paipo rides well in almost any kind of surf. From knee high waves to overhead surf, The Lunch Truck easily gets you into the pocket so you can stare down those barrels and enjoy the stoke.

Shaped with a small amount of rocker in the nose for less drag and a slight concave towards the tail for better lift and drive.  Twin fins made from recycled skateboards loosen up the tail for tighter turns and more speed.

Designed to be ridden prone with surf swim fins, this is a fast, light and durable bodyboard that can handle the toughest of waves.

Made from sustainable Paulownia wood with twin fins made from recycled skateboards. Finished with an eco-friendly, waterproof sealer.

All of our products are custom made so please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery. We occasionally have boards in stock which can be shipped the next business day. Please contact us if you need an expedited order.

name: Surfboard Bottle Opener
description:
Our wall mount surfboard bottle opener board is a perfect
addition to any kitchen, living room, patio or even your boat. With a full size cast metal bottle opener, this sturdy board will always be there to open your beverages.

Handcrafted from quality, sustainable, birch ply and sealed with an eco-friendly, non-toxic, low-VOC, water-based finish.

Dimensions: 14”x 4½”x ½”

All of our products are custom made so please allow 3 weeks for delivery. We occasionally have boards in stock which can be shipped the next business day. Please contact us if you need your order quicker.

Easy to hang hardware with instructions included. Recommended to mount board onto a solid surface.

name: Skateboard Bottle Opener
description:
Our handheld bottle opener is handcrafted from 3 pieces of upcycled skateboards laminated together with a stainless steel opener.  Finished with an eco friendly sealer made from whey, a natural and renewable resource.

Dimensions:  4” x 1” x 1/2"

name: Growth Chart Board
description: Keep track of your sprouting kids with this fun and stylish surfboard growth chart. This board is a sturdy, long lasting addition to your child’s room. Our design comes in four colors to match a variety of kids room decor. Growth chart measurements start at 24 inches and extend to 63 inches. Handcrafted from quality, sustainable, birch ply and sealed with an eco friendly, non-toxic, low-VOC, water-based finish. Dimensions: 44¾” x 9½” x ½” Personalization available* All of our products are custom made so please allow 3 weeks for delivery. We occasionally have boards in stock which can be shipped the next business day. Please contact us if you need your order quicker. Easy to hang hardware with instructions included. *To personalize your purchase with a custom name, add that product to your cart and specify the name as you would like it to appear in either (1) the "Notes to Seller" box in checkout (located under your shipping address) or (2) an email with your Transaction ID #. View our our color chart

name: Surfboard Rack
description:
Organize your board collection and surf equipment with our surfboard rack.  Easily holds 2 boards, wetsuits, towels and trunks.

Handcrafted from quality sustainable birch and sealed with an eco-friendly, non-toxic, low-VOC, water-based finish. 

Colors: Natural
Dimensions:  34"x 8½"x ¾”

All of our products are custom made so please allow 3 weeks for delivery. We occasionally have boards in stock which can be shipped the next business day. Please contact us if you need your order quicker.

Easy to hang hardware with instructions included.

name: Surf Rack Mini
description:
Dry and organize your surf gear with our Surf Rack Mini.  

Originally designed as a way to properly dry our gear after bodysurf sessions, this rack is a must have for post surf or beach sessions.

Slip your fins, wetsuits and even your handplanes on to the center dowel and hang the rest of your gear on either of the 2 single hooks.

Handcrafted from quality sustainable birch and sealed with an eco-friendly, non-toxic, low-VOC, water-based exterior finish. 

Colors: Natural

Dimensions:  21"x 6”x ¾”

All of our products are custom made so please allow 3 weeks for delivery. We occasionally have boards in stock which can be shipped the next business day. Please contact us if you need your order quicker.

Easy to hang hardware with instructions included.

description: Not only great for hanging keys, our Keyring Board can also be used as an organizer for your kid’s room to hang everything from necklaces and hair ribbons to binoculars, hats and sunglasses. Handcrafted from quality, sustainable, birch ply and sealed with an eco-friendly, non-toxic, low-VOC, water-based finish. Dimensions: 20½” x 6” x ½” All of our products are custom made so please allow 3 weeks for delivery. We occasionally have boards in stock which can be shipped the next business day. Please contact us if you need your order quicker. Easy to hang hardware with instructions included. View our our color chart

name: Eco-Tee Men's
description:
Our new eco-friendly logo Tee shirts are made of 100% upcycled single jersey cotton.  

The Tee shirts come from Looptworks, a company with rad Eco creds.  Each shirt conserves 400+ gallons of water compared to regular organic shirts and they reduce pre-consumer industrial excess.  

Comfortable, breathable and durable.

name: Eco-Tee Women's
description:
Our new eco-friendly logo Tee shirts are made of 100% upcycled single jersey cotton.  

The Tee shirts come from Looptworks, a company with rad Eco creds.  Each shirt conserves 400+ gallons of water compared to regular organic shirts and they reduce pre-consumer industrial excess.  

Comfortable, breathable and durable.

name: Eco Hoodie
description:
Eco-friendly.  Soft.  Lightweight. 

This classic pullover hoodie is made from soft and natural Eco-Fleece. Features a drawstring hood and kangaroo front pocket with a plush fleece lining.

Unisex Regular Fit.

Choose color & size below.

name: Eco Trucker Hat
description:
Feel good about the hat you wear!

With an embroidered Westside Boards logo on the front, our 6 paneled trucker hat rocks some serious eco creds.  

Made from organic cotton and recycled polyester from soda bottles.

Adjustable plastic closure.

One size fits most.

Colors: Charcoal/ Black

name: Wetsuit Koozie
description: Stylish and eco-friendly! Your order comes with 2 Koozies. Constructed out of high quality upcycled neoprene wetsuits. These handmade slip on koozies are great for use at the beach, BBQs, on boats, or wherever you need to keep your drink cold and your hand warm. Each one is uniquely different and maintains features from its original wetsuit. Printed with the Westside Boards logo on one side and our hibiscus flower on the other. Fits 12-16 oz bottled beverages, cans and water bottles. Washable and extremely durable. *Interested in your own design? Custom Orders Available - email us for more information*

name: Step Stool
description:
This surfboard shaped step stool is a great addition to your bathroom or any room in your house where your growing kids need that extra boost. Perfect for washing hands, brushing teeth in the bathroom, helping in the kitchen or anywhere your child needs
to safely access something out of their reach.

Handcrafted from quality, sustainable, birch ply and sealed with an eco-friendly, non-toxic, low-VOC, water-based finish.

Dimensions: 17 ½”L x 8”W x 7 ½”H

All of our products are custom made so please allow 3 weeks for delivery. We occasionally have boards in stock which can be shipped the next business day. Please contact us if you need your order quicker.

name: Gift Certificate
description:
Westside Boards Gift Certificates

Not sure which board or rack is a good choice for a friend or family member?  Want to buy a T-shirt for your cousin but you’re not sure which size or color?  Does your Husband want a new Handplane but you aren’t sure which one is a good fit?

No worries!

Our Gift Certificates are a great choice for the person that’s hard to shop for.
Made from actual wood from our offcuts, each gift certificate is decorated with the Westside Boards logo. 

Gift Certificates are available in amounts of $25, $50, $75, $100, $150 and $200 and they can be used on any of our products.
